title: Justice Dept. Weighs Special Counsel for Trump Inquiries if He Runs
description: The department is hoping to make decisions on whether to charge the former president in the documents and Jan. 6 inquiries before the 2024 campaign heats up.
dc:creator: Glenn Thrush

media:content.media:credit: Brittainy Newman for The New York Times
media:content.media:description: Former President Donald J. Trump leaving Trump Tower in August. Some Justice Department officials are worried about how any decision by Mr. Trump to run again could affect its handling of two investigations involving him.
